entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who is the Head of Gryffindor House's Fat Friar and Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington. He is described as having a pleased look on his face.

relationships.description: Nearly Headless Nick addressed the new Gryffindors.
The House Championship is mentioned in the context of Nearly Headless Nick's question to the new Gryffindors.
Gryffindor have never gone so long without winning, compared to Slytherin.
